All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
COSESignatureException
Exception handler
JSONEnclMethodInterface
This interface defines a contract for processing JSON documents using the Jackson library.
JSONEnclosingMethods
Procedures to enclose the signature in the data structure
JSONFileManagement
JSON files management
JSONSignature
This class implements the method for signing a message with COSE signatures using COSE_Sign1 structures with null payload
JSONSignatureInterface
The JSONSignatureInterface defines a set of methods for signing JSON documents, loading JSON content from files, and saving JSON nodes to files.
JSONVerification
This class implements the method for verifying a signature created with COSE.
JSONVerificationInterface
The JSONVerificationInterface defines operations for verifying JSON documents and loading them from files.
Parameters
Class to handle parameters to be configured
XMLEnclosingMethodInterface
This interface defines a contract for processing XML documents using the JDOM2 library.
XMLEnclosingMethods
Procedures to enclose the signature in the XML data structure
XMLFileManagement
XML files management
XMLSignature
This class implements the method for signing a message with COSE signatures using COSE_Sign1 structures with null payload
XMLSignatureInterface
The interface defines a contract for operations related to signing and handling XML documents.
XMLVerification
This class implements the method for verifying a signature created with COSE.
XMLVerificationInterface
Verification interface class
